WorkPlace.Name: Novasa Interactive ApS
WorkPlace.Description: Novasa har som Danmarks ældste app-bureau udviklet en række af de mest elskede og brugte apps her i landet for kunder som TV 2, TDC, Københavns Lufthavne, Danfoss, Georg Jensen, REMA 1000, Viasat samt Momondo.com. Med skarp fokus på design og brugervenlighed udvikler Novasa applikationer af alle typer og størrelser, lige fra underholdningsprodukter til store enterprise-løsninger.

Med skarp fokus på design og brugervenlighed udvikler Novasa applikationer af alle typer og størrelser, lige fra underholdningsprodukter til store enterprise-løsninger.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
For our team in Copenhagen, we are looking for a talented and creative Android developer. Ideally, you've previously worked in professional development teams, and are aware of both your strengths and (just as importantly) your weaknesses. If you've previously shipped complex, UI intensive apps, it's a big plus.

We are advocates for native app development, and prefer this method over cross platform development. However, if you have any experience with cross platform technologies such as React Native or Flutter, it's not a bad thing.

We're Novasa, Denmarks first app agency. Our story began way before anyone had proved that developing apps for clients in an agency model was a viable business model. It turned out that we were on to something, although we did have to wait for the arrival of Android and iOS for things to really take off.

We work for a wide variety of clients, ranging from startups to large, market-leading companies. Our approach is always the same, whether we're working on an app for an upstart or an established e-commerce app.

We provide a relaxed and inclusive work environment. Our office is located at Søtorvet by the Lakes in Copenhagen, close to Nørreport Station. The pandemic has taught us all that it's possible to work remotely, so this is an option, but for the most part, we prefer to work in person at our office. Therefore, being in commuting distance from Copenhagen is a requirement.

We share our office space with two other interesting companies in the same space as us, so there is a great, collegial atmosphere in the office.

Our primary work language is Danish, so proficiency with this language is a big plus, but let's be real, we can't expect the perfect candidate to be fluent in this obscure language. In that case, good written and spoken English is an absolute must.

Please be aware, that due to the type of clients that we work with, you may be required to get a security clearance from the authorities in order to be accepted for the job. If so, we will take care of the process.

Does this sound like something for you? If so, we would love to hear from you!
